burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa

Class ActionFeaturesQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.vfa.ActionFeaturesQuery

  • public class ActionFeaturesQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that associates an action with a set of state features.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

      • featuresForQuery

        public boolean featuresForQuery(GroundedAction ga)
        Indicates whether this association is for a given action.
        Parameters:
        ga - a given action to check against
        Returns:
        true of this objects action is the same as the input action

      • getActionFeaturesForQueryFromSet

        public static ActionFeaturesQuery getActionFeaturesForQueryFromSet(GroundedAction query,
                                                                   java.util.List<ActionFeaturesQuery> actionFeaturesSets)
        Returns the ActionFeaturesQuery object from a list of ActionFeaturesQuery objects that is associated with a given action.
        Parameters:
        query - the query action to find the ActionFeaturesQuery for
        actionFeaturesSets - the list of ActionFeaturesQuery objects to search
        Returns:
        the ActionFeaturesQuery object that is associated with a given action. Null if it does not exist in the list.
